item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）第一季度利润因维护需求增加而增长
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团周二公布第一季度利润增长，原因是新飞机的持续短缺促使航空公司继续使用旧飞机，从而推动了对高利润售后零部件和服务的强劲需求。【原文：GE Aerospace reported a higher first-quarter profit on Tuesday, as a persistent shortage of new aircraft pushes airlines to keep older jets in service, driving strong demand for high-margin aftermarket parts and services.】

item.title: 美股期货在大跌后反弹；企业盈利成为焦点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的批评激怒了投资者，美国股指期货周二上涨，在前一交易日股市暴跌后反弹。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday, bouncing back after equities tumbled in the previous session, when President Donald Trump's criticism of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell rattled investors.】

item.title: 巴西的可可大王希望通过巨型农场彻底改变可可产业
item.description: 在巴西巴伊亚州，农民莫伊塞斯-施密特（Moises Schmidt）正在开发世界上最大的可可农场。【原文：In the Brazilian state of Bahia, farmer Moises Schmidt is developing the world's largest cocoa farm.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者等待有关经济型电动汽车和提高销量计划的详细信息
item.description: 特斯拉的投资者急切地想知道，今年推出廉价汽车和机器人出租车服务的计划是否步入正轨，首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）是否准备很快放弃在特朗普政府中的角色，重新更紧密地管理公司。【原文：Tesla investors are anxious to know if plans to roll out a cheaper car and a robotaxi service this year are on track, and whether CEO Elon Musk is ready to ditch his role in the Trump administration soon and get back to managing the company more closely.】

item.title: 英特尔业绩凸显新任首席执行官谭群钊扭转多年失误的策略
item.description: 英特尔的季度财报将最清晰地展示新任首席执行官陈立武为这家陷入困境的美国芯片制造商制定的扭亏战略，投资者希望看到他正在扭转多年战略失误的早期迹象。【原文：Intel's quarterly results will offer the clearest look yet at new CEO Lip-Bu Tan's turnaround strategy for the embattled American chipmaker, and investors are hoping for early signs that he is reversing years of strategic lapses.】

item.title: Elevance 确认季度利润增长，重申 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 医疗保险公司 Elevance Health 周二表示，其第一季度利润高于市场预期，与上周发布的初步预期持平，而在此之前，风向标联合健康（UnitedHealth）下调了全年业绩预期，引发了该行业的大跌。【原文：Health insurer Elevance Health said on Tuesday its first-quarter profit came above Street expectations, matching the preliminary estimates it released last week after bellwether UnitedHealth's lowered full-year forecast triggered a selloff in the sector.】

item.title: 聚焦：消息人士称，特朗普正考虑将美国药价降至国际水平
item.description: 据两位公司消息人士称，制药行业最关心的问题是特朗普政府正在考虑将美国药品价格与其他发达国家支付的较低金额挂钩。【原文：Drugmakers have been warned that the Trump Administration is considering linking U.S. medicine prices to lower amounts paid by other developed countries, according to two company sources who called the option the pharmaceutical industry's top concern.】

item.title: 许多在美国的加拿大 "雪鸟 "希望打包飞往北方--一劳永逸
item.description: 今年春天，计划出售其在阳光明媚的佛罗里达州和亚利桑那州的第二套住房的加拿大 "雪鸟 "数量激增，他们中的许多人因为美国和加拿大之间的关系突然变冷而打消了出售的念头。【原文：The number of Canadian "snowbirds" planning to sell their second homes in sunny Florida and Arizona has surged this spring, many of them put off by the sudden chill that has blanketed relations between their homeland and the U.S.】

item.title: 投资者担心特朗普对鲍威尔的攻击会加剧痛苦
item.description: 投资者担心，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普试图解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），削弱人们对央行抗击通胀和独立行事能力的信心，资产价格将受到沉重打击。【原文：Investors are fearful of a deep hit to asset prices if U.S. President Donald Trump attempts to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, undermining confidence in the central bank's ability to fight inflation and act independently.】

item.title: 荷兰情报机构称俄罗斯正加紧对欧洲发动混合攻击
item.description: 荷兰军事情报局（MIVD）周二表示，俄罗斯正在增加旨在破坏荷兰及其欧洲盟国社会的混合攻击，俄罗斯黑客已经将目标对准了荷兰公共服务部门。【原文：Russia is increasing its hybrid attacks aimed at undermining society in the Netherlands and its European allies, and Russian hackers have already targeted the Dutch public service, Dutch military intelligence agency MIVD said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国残酷的电动车革命几乎没有利润空间
item.description: 香港维多利亚港的夕阳西下，衣着光鲜的社交媒体影响者们涌向中国汽车制造商新鹏（Xpeng）的一系列时尚电动汽车，新鹏是全球首屈一指的电动汽车市场上最热门的品牌之一。【原文：As the sun set over Hong Kong's Victoria Harbour, well-dressed social media influencers swarmed a lineup of sleek electric vehicles from Chinese automaker Xpeng , among the buzziest brands in the world’s premier EV market.】

item.title: ZEW 发现大多数德国企业担心特朗普关税的负面影响
item.description: 莱布尼兹欧洲经济研究中心（ZEW）的一项调查显示，超过 80% 的德国制造业和信息技术产业公司预计美国征收关税将对德国经济产生负面影响。【原文：More than 80% of German companies in manufacturing and the information technology industry expect a negative impact on the German economy from tariffs imposed by the U.S., according to a survey by the Leibniz Centre for European Economic Research ZEW.】

item.title: 瑞穗和乐天咨询合资公司的目标是到 2029 年资产达到 3.6 亿美元
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group）和乐天集团（Rakuten Group）旗下证券部门的合资金融咨询公司首席执行官表示，该公司的目标是在运营的头五年内，客户资产达到 500 亿日元（3.57 亿美元）。【原文：The financial advisory joint venture of the securities arms of Mizuho Financial Group and Rakuten Group is aiming to reach 50 billion yen ($357 million) in customer assets in its first five years of operations, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称，关税前欧元区企业的经营势头有所改善
item.description: 欧洲央行周二的一项调查显示，在特朗普政府于4月初宣布加征关税之前的几周内，欧元区企业的经营势头有所改善，这主要反映了工业部门复苏的萌芽。【原文：Euro zone firms were reporting improved business momentum in the weeks leading up to the Trump administration's early April tariff announcement, mainly reflecting an incipient recovery in the industrial sector, an ECB survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 爱立信扩大在印度的生产规模，制造天线
item.description: 瑞典爱立信公司周二表示，该公司计划为印度市场生产所有电信天线。【原文：Sweden's Ericsson is planning to manufacture all its telecom antennas for the Indian market in the country, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在迪拜黄金集市，金条创下的最高纪录并没有给珠宝商带来多少喜悦
item.description: 在被誉为 "黄金之城 "的迪拜熙熙攘攘的黄金集市上，22K 黄金首饰是婚礼、宗教庆典和家庭投资的传统宠儿。【原文：In the bustling Gold Souk in Dubai, dubbed the "City of Gold", 22-karat gold jewellery is a traditional favourite for weddings, religious celebrations, and as a family investment.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯发布名为 "Vision V "的全新豪华轿车电动车细分市场
item.description: 德国汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周二发布了一款名为 "Vision V "的全新纯电动豪华轿车，标志着该公司厢式车产品组合高端化的扩展。【原文：German carmaker Mercedes-Benz unveiled on Tuesday a new all-electric luxury limousine segment it called "Vision V" which it said marked the expansion of the top end of its vans portfolio.】

item.title: KKR 出价 12 亿美元收购瑞典 Biotage 公司
item.description: 瑞典 Biotage 公司周二表示，KKR 已对这家瑞典生物技术公司提出现金收购要约，估值约为 116 亿瑞典克朗（12.2 亿美元）。【原文：Sweden's Biotage said on Tuesday that KKR had made a cash offer for the Swedish biotechnology firm, valuing it at around 11.6 billion Swedish crowns ($1.22 billion).】

item.title: 日本认为在与美国的会谈中就日元问题达成大交易的余地不大
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）本周将在华盛顿会见美国财务大臣斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）。【原文：When Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato meets his U.S. counterpart Scott Bessent in Washington this week, the yen is shaping up to be a major topic of discussion, though sources say Tokyo will push back against any request to boost its currency.】

item.title: 希腊金融技术供应商 Qualco 计划在雅典上市
item.description: 总部位于希腊的金融技术供应商 Qualco 周二表示，计划启动首次公开募股，在雅典证券交易所上市。【原文：Greece-based financial technology provider Qualco plans to launch an initial public offering to list its shares on the Athens Stock Exchange, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 研究显示：中国在施加政治压力的同时也加强了对台湾的商业魅力攻势
item.description: 本周二的一项研究显示，2024 年将有近 4 万名台湾人参加中国政府支持的行业活动，如会议和贸易博览会。【原文：Nearly 40,000 Taiwanese joined industry events in China such as conferences and trade fairs supported by the Chinese government in 2024, a study showed on Tuesday, as Beijing ramps up a charm offensive toward the island alongside military pressure.】

item.title: 瑞士保险公司 Helvetia 和 Baloise 将合并，创建前 10 强公司
item.description: Helvetia 和 Baloise 周二表示，计划合并成立瑞士第二大保险集团，合并后的业务量将达到 200 亿瑞士法郎（约合 246.9 亿美元）。【原文：Helvetia and Baloise plan to merge to create Switzerland's second-largest insurance group with a combined business volume of 20 billion Swiss francs ($24.69 billion), the pair said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 罗氏未来五年将在美国投资 500 亿美元
item.description: 罗氏公司周二表示，未来五年将在美国投资 500 亿美元，这是公司应对唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的最大外来投资举措之一。【原文：Roche on Tuesday said it will invest $50 billion in the United States over the next five years, in one of the biggest inward investment moves by companies dealing with President Donald Trump's tariffs policy.】

item.title: 解说员：特朗普能否解雇美联储鲍威尔的已知信息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一继续就美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）目前拒绝进一步降息一事对美联储主席进行口头攻击，这令金融市场愈发担心特朗普最终可能会试图就此解雇这位美国央行行长。【原文：President Donald Trump on Monday kept up his verbal assault on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell over the Fed's refusal for now to further cut interest rates, rattling financial markets growing ever more fearful that Trump may ultimately try to fire the U.S. central bank chief over the matter.】

item.title: 文件显示越南严厉打击美国出口欺诈行为
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份文件显示，越南贸易部已发出指令，打击向美国和其他贸易伙伴非法转运货物的行为，以避免美国征收高额关税。【原文：Vietnam's trade ministry has issued a directive to crack down on illegal transhipment of goods to the United States and other trading partners as it tries to avoid steep U.S. tariffs, according to a document reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 早间竞标努力遏制美国市场蔓延
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支持的 Flipkart 将把基地从新加坡迁回印度
item.description: Flipkart 电子商务公司周二表示，其控股公司将从新加坡转移到印度，因为其母公司沃尔玛希望将这家成立 17 年的公司上市。【原文：Flipkart will shift its holding company from Singapore to India, the e-commerce company said on Tuesday, as its parent Walmart aims to take the 17-year-old company public.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：印度面临关税压力，要求亚马逊和沃尔玛全面开放市场
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引行业高管、游说者和美国政府官员的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府打算向印度施压，让亚马逊和沃尔玛等在线零售商全面进入印度价值 1250 亿美元的电子商务市场。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration intends to press India to give online retailers such as Amazon and Walmart full access to its $125 billion ecommerce market, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing industry executives, lobbyists and U.S. government officials.】

item.title: 英国自动驾驶初创公司 Wayve 在日本设立测试与开发中心
item.description: 英国自动驾驶技术初创公司 Wayve 周二表示，它已在日本建立了一个新的测试和开发中心，这是它首次进军亚洲市场。【原文：British self-driving technology startup Wayve said on Tuesday it has established a new testing and development centre in Japan, its first expansion into an Asian market.】

item.title: 韩国代理总统认为美国贸易谈判将带来有利解决方案
item.description: 韩国代总统韩德洙在周二的内阁会议上表示，他希望本周与美国举行的贸易谈判能为达成互惠互利的解决方案铺平道路。【原文：South Korea's acting President Han Duck-soo said during a Cabinet meeting on Tuesday that he expects trade talks this week with the United States to pave the way toward a mutually beneficial solution.】
